mapper.select: select mno, name, nicknm, email from hiba_membs where mno = #{value}
select no, name, nicknm, email from hiba_membs where no=#{no} and password=password(#{password})
mapper.insert: insert into hiba_membs(name, nicknm, email, pwd) values (#{name}, #{nicknm}, #{email}, password(#{pwd}))
